name: DELETE ME!
short_description:
This library was meant to be high performance, however, upon further investigation, I found libraries such as glut were far better, so this project is now abandoned.

Due to SF's policies, this project unfortunately cannot be deleted, and I no longer publish on SF due to their controversy with bundled adware.
